title: Maximal Martingale Wasserstein Inequality. (arXiv:2310.08492v1 [math.PR])
abstract: In this note, we complete the analysis of the Martingale Wasserstein Inequality started in arXiv:2011.11599 by checking that this inequality fails in dimension $d\ge 2$ when the integrability parameter $\rho$ belongs to $[1,2)$ while a stronger Maximal Martingale Wasserstein Inequality holds whatever the dimension $d$ when $\rho\ge 2$.
context:
Title: Maximal Martingale Wasserstein Inequality. (arXiv:2310.08492v1 [math.PR])
Abstract: In this note, we complete the analysis of the Martingale Wasserstein Inequality started in arXiv:2011.11599 by checking that this inequality fails in dimension $d\ge 2$ when the integrability parameter $\rho$ belongs to $[1,2)$ while a stronger Maximal Martingale Wasserstein Inequality holds whatever the dimension $d$ when $\rho\ge 2$.
translated_title: 最大鞍点对数概率分配不等式
translated_abstract: 在这篇论文中，我们完成了对于在arXiv:2011.11599中开始的鞍点对数概率分配不等式的分析，验证了当积分参数$\rho$属于$[1,2)$且维度$d\ge2$时，该不等式在维度$d\ge2$下是不成立的，而当$\rho\ge2$时，存在一个更强的最大鞍点对数概率分配不等式。
tldr: 该论文针对鞍点对数概率分配不等式进行了进一步分析，发现在维度$d\ge2$且积分参数$\rho$属于$[1,2)$时不成立，而在维度$d\ge2$时且$\rho\ge2$时存在更强的最大鞍点对数概率分配不等式。
en_tdlr: This paper provides further analysis on the Martingale Wasserstein Inequality and shows that it fails in dimension $d\ge 2$ when the integrability parameter $\rho$ belongs to $[1,2)$, while a stronger Maximal Martingale Wasserstein Inequality exists in dimension $d\ge2$ for $\rho\ge2$.
